import React, {useState} from 'react' import Feedback from '../Feedback' export default function Login ({feedback, login, email, password}) { const [emailInput, setEmail] = useState(null) const [passwordInput, setPassword] = useState(null) const handleFormSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault() alert(`Email: ${emailInput}, Password:${passwordInput}`) } return (

{login}

setEmail(e.target.value)}/>

setPassword(e.target.value)} />

{feedback && }

) }
